name: C-Fire 2013 - Women's Tee |  Wild Fire Tees Signature Tee By Austin Buck
description:
After Waldo Canyon, we created the C-Fire original as a badge of honor to represent the indomitable spirit of our communities that continue to fight fire. As Black Forest burns, that spirit is alive -- and we want to have the backs of victims, firefighters and first responders. Colorado burns again, but we stand strong.

New Women’s size! Get the right size -- check out the size chart for this tee by clicking here.

Only Available in sizes small-2XL.

Designed by Austin Buck
of Copilot Creative
Colorado Springs, CO

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado.

What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!)

Shipping info

Free shipping in the U.S. Orders will ship within 7-10 days.

Shipping times can vary depending on volume of orders and stock, but we should be sticking very closely to this estimated timeframe.

name: Colorado Surf Co. - Women's Tee | Designed by Austin Buck
description:
When life hands you floods, make…a surfing tee! If there's something we've learned after the disastrous wildfires, it's how to face disaster head on. With epic floods hammering our state, we're bringing our steely resolve, our generosity and our characteristic humor to help people who are recovering from these floods. Buy a tee, give a 'life preserver' to those who need it.

New Women’s size! Get the right size -- check out the size chart for this tee by clicking here.

Only Available in sizes small-2XL.

Designed by Austin Buck
of Copilot Creative
Colorado Springs, CO

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado.

What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!)

Shipping info

Free shipping in the U.S. Orders will ship within 7-10 days.

Shipping times can vary depending on volume of orders and stock, but we should be sticking very closely to this estimated timeframe.

name: Come Hell or High Water | Designed by Fixer Creative Co.
description:
Through hellish fires and floods of biblical proportions, we stand by our amazing state and the great people who live in it. Declare your resolve (and generously send some love) with this steely-eyed tee. But trust us, if legions of frogs and locusts start showing up next summer, we are seriously out of here. (Just kidding.)

Designed by Fixer Creative Co.  Colorado Springs, CO

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page.

name: Buy One for a Firefighter - C Fire 2013
description:
PLEASE READ THE WHOLE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION.

We heard from one of the local Colorado Springs firefighters who loved the shirts and was going to put in an order for him, fellow firefighters and other crews.

We're not going to let that happen -- because we're going to buy it for them -- with your help.  

You buy, we'll deliver to as many firefighters as we have shirts, and say thanks from a grateful community.

Our firefighters are on the front lines, fighting fire and fighting for us.  Let's cover their backs, literally.

PLEASE READ THIS NOTE:
These will NOT ship to you, we'll deliver to fire stations around the state.  

You can buy this in addition to other shirts.  If you do that, the shirts you buy for yourself will ship to you, and this one will go to a firefighter.

There aren't sizes, because we'll work with them on that.

name: More Disco Less Inferno | Designed by Mike Solo
description:
In the midst of great tragedy, it feels really good to laugh. Let's make this our state motto going forward. Designed by Mike Solo of Hello Image Fort Collins, CO

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page.

Shipping info

Free shipping in the U.S. Shipping will happen 7-10 business days after you order. If we have your tees in ye olde inventory, you’ll probably get it earlier (yay!). Shipping times can vary depending on volume of orders and stock, but we should be sticking very closely to this estimated timeframe (i.e. you won’t be getting your tee when it’s snowing outside.)

name: Fire Mountain | Designed by Jay Fanelli
description:
Designed by Jay Fanelli of
Full Stop Interactive + United Pixelworkers Pittsburgh, PA "We know a little something about t-shirts and the collective spirit, so it was only natural that we helped our fellow pixelworkers in Colorado do some good." -- Jay About the designer WFT Note: Over 1/2 of our Wild Fire Team are United Pixelworkers fans and sport their well-designed, limited edition tees often. Jay Fanelli is the co-founder and designer of Full Stop Interactive, a web design and development studio in Pittsburgh, PA. Full Stop are the masterminds behind href=http://www.unitedpixelworkers.com/>United Pixelworkers , the design union masquerading as a t-shirt storefront. Jay can be found mouthing off on Twitter at @fanelli or rallying the troops at @pixelworkers.

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page.

What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!)

Shipping times can vary depending on volume of orders and stock, but we should be sticking very closely to this estimated timeframe (i.e. you won’t be getting your tee when it’s snowing outside.)

name: Spread Love Like Wildfire | Designed by Design Rangers
description:
This has become our motto: when disaster spreads, let's spread the love around even faster. There's so many ways to help, and all of them will be made that much sweeter while you're wearing this shirt (which conveniently sends money to the wildfire victims, too). Designed by Design Rangers Colorado Springs, CO

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page.

What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!)

Shipping info

Free shipping in the U.S. Orders placed now through June 24th: Most orders will begin shipping out beginning June 24th in the order received, so we have time to print your tees. That means you should expect to receive your tees somewhere between June 24th and July 4th. If we have your tees in ye olde inventory, you’ll probably get it earlier (yay!).

If you place your order after June 24th, you should receive your tees within 7-10 business days of order. Shipping times can vary depending on volume of orders and stock, but we should be sticking very closely to this estimated timeframe (i.e. you won’t be getting your tee when it’s snowing outside.)

name: Persevere 2013 | Designed by Tristan Plank
description:
After the immediate danger passes, the real work begins, especially for those who continue to be affected every day by the fires that aren't so distant a memory. And if we work hard and persevere, we find new life -- just underneath the surface -- just waiting to greet us. Designed by Tristan Plank at HF Designworks, Inc. Boulder, CO

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page.

What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!)

Shipping info

Free shipping in the U.S. Orders will ship within 7-10 days.

name: Hold the Line 2013 | Designed by Matt Andrews
description:
Our firefighters are simply amazing and they are at it again. They have taken an oath to stand in the gap between us and danger, and they do it well. They hold the line for us, and this is a small way to hold the line for them and say thanks for their incredible service. Designed by Matt Andrews of Copilot Creative Colorado Springs, CO

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page.

name: F@#% Fire - Designed by Anonymous
description:
Lives lost, homes lost, dreams lost, our beautiful state charred and scarred for years to come... and it's happening again. It's hard not to get angry. This designer, who wished to remain uncredited, did.

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page.

name: Love From Above - Batch 2 | Designed by Paul Jones
description:
Fighting fires this big takes brave fighters on the ground and some serious air support. We've watched in awe as the MAFFS C-130s swooped in time after time through the smoke and flames to drop water on the raging fires. We thank them for fighting for us -- and our hearts go out to those who have lost their lives doing so. Designed by Paul Jones at Uzu Media Colorado Springs, CO

All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page.

What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!)

Shipping info

Free shipping in the U.S. Orders will ship within 7-10 days.

name: Welcome to Colorado Silkscreen print - LastLeaf Printing
description: In the wake of seeing so much of our state scorched by destructive fires it's sometimes hard to remember how beautiful our state is and will be once again. Hanging this pop-art inspired print on your wall will remind you just how welcoming, generous and beautiful the Centennial state really is. Designed by LastLeaf Printing Pueblo, CO Limited edition 18"x24" hand-printed 3-color silkscreen poster printed on 100# cover stock Edition run - 100 Note: This print will ship separately from tees. You may receive your order in two packages if you ordered a print and tee. Usually ships within 5-7 business days.

name: Make It Rain - Batch 1 | Designed by Jeremy Grant
description:
LIMITED SIZES

Nothing helps extinguish the fires of Colorado like a downpour of rain, bringing moisture back to land. And nothing would help the people affected by this fire and other tragedies like an outpouring of generosity from people who can help. Let's make it rain. Designed by Jeremy Grant Colorado Springs, CO All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page. What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!)

Free shipping in the U.S. Orders will ship within 7-10 days.

name: Tree Huggers - Batch 3 | Designed by Michael Hefner
description:
LIMITED SIZES

As we continue to help the human victims of Colorado wildfire, we can't forget about another victim of the fire: our beautiful landscape. Tree huggers unite to rebuild, reforest, regrow our state. description:

name: WFT! - Batch 1 | Designed by Fixer Creative Co.
description:
LIMITED SIZES

The entire state watched with their jaws dropped in disbelief as fires raged all over the state. At many points there was nothing we (and others) could do but stare at the pictures and think "What The F@!k?!" Turn your angry WTFs into awesome WFTs (Wild Fire Tees) instead! Designed by Fixer Creative Co. Colorado Springs, CO All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page. What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!) Free shipping in the U.S. Usually ships within 7-10 business days.

name: SOS - Batch 1 | Designed by Fixer Creative Co.
description:
LIMITED SIZES

SOS is the international Morse code distress signal. And when Colorado put out the distress signal, our communities have answered. Keep answering that call, Colorado, and we'll save our state. Designed by Fixer Creative Co. Colorado Springs, CO All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page. What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!) Free shipping in the U.S. Usually ships within 7-10 business days.

name: Stay Wild - Batch 2 | Designed by Amy Sullivan
description: As fires burned, wildlife ran for cover, sometimes right into our cities. We hate wildfire, love wildlife. We protect and help rebuild their beautiful natural habitat so they can be free, and stay wild forever. We've heard you, bear. We're on it. Designed by Amy Sullivan Colorado Springs, CO All WildFire Tees are printed on high-quality, 100% cotton pre-shrunk tees and screenprinted with love right here in Colorado. Sizing charts and info can be found on our Shirt + Sizing Info page. What you see is what you get; All sales are final (and awesome!) Free shipping in the U.S. Usually ships within 1-3 business days.
